verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

נָשֹׂ֗א <WH5375> Take אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> the sum בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons קְהָ֔ת <WH6955> of Kohath מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> from among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons לֵוִ֑י <WH3881> Leviite לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> by the house אֲבֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> From thirty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> against בֶּן־ <WH1121> old חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> even until fifty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּא֙ <WH935> all that enter לַצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> into the host לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> the work בְּאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> This [shall be] the service בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> of Kohath בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [about] the most הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> holy things

וּבָ֨א <WH935> shall come אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <WH1121> and his sons בִּנְסֹ֣עַ <WH5265> setteth forward הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> And when the camp וְהוֹרִ֕דוּ <WH3381> and they shall take down אֵ֖ת <WH853> פָּרֹ֣כֶת <WH6532> vail הַמָּסָ֑ךְ <WH4539> the covering וְכִ֨סּוּ־ <WH3680> and cover בָ֔הּ אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲרֹ֥ן <WH727> the ark הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <WH5715> of testimony

וְנָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> And shall put עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> and כְּסוּי֙ <WH3681> thereon the covering ע֣וֹר <WH5785> skins תַּ֔חַשׁ <WH8476> of badgers' וּפָרְשׂ֧וּ <WH6566> and shall spread בֶֽגֶד־ <WH899> [it] a cloth כְּלִ֛יל <WH3632> wholly תְּכֵ֖לֶת <WH8504> of blue מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> over וְשָׂמ֖וּ <WH7760> and shall put בַּדָּֽיו׃ <WH905> in the staves

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Over שֻׁלְחַ֣ן <WH7979> And upon the table הַפָּנִ֗ים <WH6440> of shewbread יִפְרְשׂוּ֮ <WH6566> they shall spread בֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> a cloth תְּכֵלֶת֒ <WH8504> of blue וְנָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> and put עָ֠לָיו <WH5921> Over אֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּעָרֹ֤ת <WH7086> thereon the dishes וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּפֹּת֙ <WH3709> and the spoons וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנַקִּיֹּ֔ת <WH4518> and the bowls וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> קְשׂ֣וֹת <WH7184> and covers הַנָּ֑סֶךְ <WH5262> to cover withal וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> bread הַתָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> and the continual עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> Over יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <WH6566> And they shall spread עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> over בֶּ֚גֶד <WH899> upon them a cloth תּוֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <WH8144> of scarlet וְכִסּ֣וּ <WH3680> and cover אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <WH4372> the same with a covering ע֣וֹר <WH5785> skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <WH8476> of badgers' וְשָׂמ֖וּ <WH7760> and shall put אֶת־ <WH853> בַּדָּֽיו׃ <WH905> in the staves

וְלָקְח֣וּ ׀ <WH3947> And they shall take בֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> a cloth תְּכֵ֗לֶת <WH8504> of blue וְכִסּ֞וּ <WH3680> and cover אֶת־ <WH853> מְנֹרַ֤ת <WH4501> the candlestick הַמָּאוֹר֙ <WH3974> of the light וְאֶת־ <WH853> נֵ֣רֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH5216> and his lamps וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְקָחֶ֖יהָ <WH4457> and his tongs וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַחְתֹּתֶ֑יהָ <WH4289> and his snuffdishes וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> vessels שַׁמְנָ֔הּ <WH8081> and all the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְשָׁרְתוּ־ <WH8334> thereof wherewith they minister לָ֖הּ בָּהֶֽם׃

וְנָתְנ֤וּ <WH5414> And they shall put אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלֶ֔יהָ <WH3627> it and all the vessels אֶל־ <WH413> in מִכְסֵ֖ה <WH4372> thereof within a covering ע֣וֹר <WH5785> skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <WH8476> of badgers' וְנָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> and shall put עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4132> [it] upon a bar

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Over מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> altar הַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> And upon the golden יִפְרְשׂוּ֙ <WH6566> they shall spread בֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> a cloth תְּכֵ֔לֶת <WH8504> of blue וְכִסּ֣וּ <WH3680> and cover אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <WH4372> it with a covering ע֣וֹר <WH5785> skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <WH8476> of badgers' וְשָׂמ֖וּ <WH7760> and shall put אֶת־ <WH853> בַּדָּֽיו׃ <WH905> to the staves

וְלָקְחוּ֩ <WH3947> And they shall take אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֨י <WH3627> all the instruments הַשָּׁרֵ֜ת <WH8335> of ministry אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which יְשָֽׁרְתוּ־ <WH8334> wherewith they minister בָ֣ם בַּקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the sanctuary וְנָֽתְנוּ֙ <WH5414> and put אֶל־ <WH413> about בֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> [them] in a cloth תְּכֵ֔לֶת <WH8504> of blue וְכִסּ֣וּ <WH3680> and cover אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <WH4372> them with a covering ע֣וֹר <WH5785> skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <WH8476> of badgers' וְנָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> and shall put עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4132> [them] on a bar

וְדִשְּׁנ֖וּ <WH1878> And they shall take away the ashes אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> from the altar וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <WH6566> and spread עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> over בֶּ֖גֶד <WH899> cloth אַרְגָּמָֽן׃ <WH713> a purple

וְנָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> And they shall put עָ֠לָיו <WH5921> connection אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלָ֞יו <WH3627> upon it all the vessels אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יְֽשָׁרְת֧וּ <WH8334> thereof wherewith they minister עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> over בָּהֶ֗ם אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּחְתֹּ֤ת <WH4289> about it [even] the censers אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְלָגֹת֙ <WH4207> the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּעִ֣ים <WH3257> and the shovels וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת <WH4219> and the basons כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> all the vessels הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> of the altar וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <WH6566> and they shall spread עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> over כְּס֛וּי <WH3681> upon it a covering ע֥וֹר <WH5785> skins תַּ֖חַשׁ <WH8476> of badgers' וְשָׂמ֥וּ <WH7760> and put בַדָּֽיו׃ <WH905> to the staves

וְכִלָּ֣ה <WH3615> have made an end אַֽהֲרֹן־ <WH175> And when Aaron וּ֠בָנָיו <WH1121> and his sons לְכַסֹּ֨ת <WH3680> of covering אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <WH6944> the sanctuary וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> and all the vessels הַקֹּדֶשׁ֮ <WH6944> of the sanctuary בִּנְסֹ֣עַ <WH5265> is to set forward הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֒ <WH4264> as the camp וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> after כֵ֗ן <WH3651> after that יָבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> shall come בְנֵי־ <WH1121> that the sons קְהָת֙ <WH6955> of Kohath לָשֵׂ֔את <WH5375> to bear וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> they will not יִגְּע֥וּ <WH5060> [it] but they shall not touch אֶל־ <WH413> about הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [any] holy thing וָמֵ֑תוּ <WH4191> lest they die אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These מַשָּׂ֥א <WH4853> These [things are] the burden בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> of Kohath בְּאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וּפְקֻדַּ֞ת <WH6486> And to the office אֶלְעָזָ֣ר ׀ <WH499> of Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> the priest שֶׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> [pertaineth] the oil הַמָּאוֹר֙ <WH3974> for the light וּקְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> incense הַסַּמִּ֔ים <WH5561> and the sweet וּמִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> meat offering הַתָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> and the daily וְשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֑ה <WH4888> and the anointing פְּקֻדַּ֗ת <WH6486> [and] the oversight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <WH4908> of all the tabernacle וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּ֔וֹ בְּקֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> and of all that therein [is] in the sanctuary וּבְכֵלָֽיו׃ <WH3627> and in the vessels ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּכְרִ֕יתוּ <WH3772> Cut ye not off אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> the tribe מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> of the families הַקְּהָתִ֑י <WH6956> of the Kohathites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> from among הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> the Levites

וְזֹ֣את ׀ <WH2063> But עֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> But thus do לָהֶ֗ם וְחָיוּ֙ <WH2421> unto them that they may live וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not יָמֻ֔תוּ <WH4191> and not die בְּגִשְׁתָּ֖ם <WH5066> when they approach אֶת־ <WH853> קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> unto the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy things אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <WH1121> and his sons יָבֹ֔אוּ <WH935> shall go in וְשָׂמ֣וּ <WH7760> and appoint אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> them every אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> one עַל־ <WH5921> of עֲבֹדָת֖וֹ <WH5656> to his service וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מַשָּׂאֽוֹ׃ <WH4853> and to his burden

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יָבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> But they shall not go in לִרְא֛וֹת <WH7200> to see כְּבַלַּ֥ע <WH1104> are covered אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> when the holy things וָמֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> lest they die פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

נָשֹׂ֗א <WH5375> Take אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֛אשׁ <WH7218> also the sum בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹן <WH1648> of Gershon גַּם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> throughout the houses אֲבֹתָ֖ם <WH1> of their fathers לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> by their families

מִבֶּן֩ <WH1121> old שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> From thirty שָׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> years וָמַ֗עְלָה <WH4605> and upward עַ֛ד <WH5704> against בֶּן־ <WH1121> old חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> until fifty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years תִּפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> shalt thou number אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבָּא֙ <WH935> them all that enter in לִצְבֹ֣א <WH6633> to perform צָבָ֔א <WH6635> the service לַעֲבֹ֥ד <WH5647> to do עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> the work בְּאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise עֲבֹדַ֔ת <WH5656> This [is] the service מִשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <WH4940> of the families הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֑י <WH1649> of the Gershonites לַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> to serve וּלְמַשָּֽׂא׃ <WH4853> and for burdens

וְנָ֨שְׂא֜וּ <WH5375> And they shall bear אֶת־ <WH853> יְרִיעֹ֤ת <WH3407> the curtains הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <WH4908> of the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> and the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation מִכְסֵ֕הוּ <WH4372> his covering וּמִכְסֵ֛ה <WH4372> and the covering הַתַּ֥חַשׁ <WH8476> of the badgers' אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> is on מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> skins that [is] above וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> מָסַ֔ךְ <WH4539> upon it and the hanging פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> for the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> קַלְעֵ֨י <WH7050> And the hangings הֶֽחָצֵ֜ר <WH2691> of the court וְאֶת־ <WH853> מָסַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH4539> and the hanging פֶּ֣תַח ׀ <WH6607> for the door שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate הֶחָצֵ֗ר <WH2691> of the court אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמִּשְׁכָּ֤ן <WH4908> which [is] by the tabernacle וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> and by the altar סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מֵֽיתְרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4340> and their cords וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> and all the instruments עֲבֹדָתָ֑ם <WH5656> of their service וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which יֵעָשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> and all that is made לָהֶ֖ם וְעָבָֽדוּ׃ <WH5647> for them so shall they serve

עַל־ <WH5921> and פִּי֩ <WH6310> At the appointment אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> of Aaron וּבָנָ֜יו <WH1121> and his sons תִּהְיֶ֗ה <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֲבֹדַת֙ <WH5656> shall be all the service בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֔י <WH1649> of the Gershonites לְכָל־ <WH3605> all מַשָּׂאָ֔ם <WH4853> in all their burdens וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all עֲבֹדָתָ֑ם <WH5656> and in all their service וּפְקַדְתֶּ֤ם <WH6485> and ye shall appoint עֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH5921> unto בְּמִשְׁמֶ֔רֶת <WH4931> unto them in charge אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַשָּׂאָֽם׃ <WH4853> all their burdens
